entry.title: Both Haunted and Holy
entry.summary:
Author: Anselbun

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,903Chapters: 1/5Kudos: 5

Summary: Bruce Wayne is a large man- thats evident even when sitting in a tiny cell. Broad shouldered, with a sharp jaw. Even sharper eyes, that follow every movement as Clark settles in the chair and sifts through a few papers. If Clark focuses his senses, he can tell many more things about Bruce- that his body is covered in a litter of scars, both large and small. That his heartbeat is still steady and even, focused but calm. If he uses his x-ray vision, he can tell that its been probably seven hours since Bruce has eaten, but of course Clark doesn’t do that. That would be weird.And a thing Clark definitely doesn’t notice about Bruce Wayne is how handsome he is. If it weren’t for the Arkham jumpsuit, the ear-length shaggy hair, and the light coat of stubble, you could still imagine him as the charming Gotham rich boy he was meant to be.But he isn’t. He’s not Bruce Wayne, billionaire orphan anymore. Now, he’s Bruce Wayne, mass murderer, with thirty-six known victims.a world where Bruce Wayne didn't become Batman, and tried to fix Gotham in a different way. Au by @Frownyalfred on tumblr

entry.title: And I don't wanna go home yet
entry.summary:
Author: LuiGarMir

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,997Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 22

Summary: When Clark met Bruce, he didn’t think much of the man. Well, no. He’d had thoughts—a lot of them having to do with his chiseled jaw and strong shoulders—but he hadn’t seen past Batman’s dark, gloomy, unknowable persona.The man—barely a young adult when they met—had been polite and deadly efficient, but also cold and distant.Clark, a journalist at heart, wanted to know more about him, but Superman understood how precious secrecy and privacy were. So… He gave Batman some space.It took him years to discover the man’s civilian name. And it just so happened to be around the same time both men started getting closer. Or it was maybe the reason why they got close at all.

entry.title: a place to land
entry.summary:
Author: mikaminato

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,651Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 37

Summary: "Clark? What's wrong?" He asks quietly, reaching out to rest a bandaged hand against Clark's shoulder.Clark smiles, soft and a little sad."Nothing. I just... I'm glad you're here, Bruce," he says, and hopes his voice is steady. The words are honest, despite how inadequate they seem, but he can tell Bruce is reassured by them. His posture relaxes, the tension in his jaw eases, and his grip tightens, just a fraction, on Clark's shoulder.

entry.title: New to Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: LapineDoodle

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,582Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 7

Summary: So what if it's impulsive to move thousands of miles from home to New Jersey of all place? Gotham rent is cheap and have better public infrastructure despite the high crime rate. And beside, not like she can pass on the chance to attend Gotham University with free tuition thanks to grants and scholarship. So, it's time for Reyna to experience the wild Gotham City and potentially get herself into some shenanigans. At least there are bats and birds around to save the day.

entry.title: Sway
entry.summary:
Author: fuckleef

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,566Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 23

Summary: Clark’s eyes scanned the crowd, looking for, hopefully, a dancer to focus on. And there he was. A tall, dark haired one. He seemed to dance with a woman, but she obviously was struggling to keep up with the dancer. He was looking at her intensively, like he was taken by the music. The way he moved was smooth, fluid. He seemed to float, rather than just stepping around in rhythm. It was a nice thing to watch. It felt resting, comfortable for Clark.

entry.title: A Simple Request
entry.summary:
Author: bajuwa

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,413Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 91

Summary: “I have a… request I would like to make of you.”Clark’s brows instinctively furrow at his boyfriend’s uncharacteristic demeanor, but he does his best to stay calm and casual, not wanting to accidentally put Bruce on edge with his concern. If Clark has learned anything through his decade-long relationship with Batman—including only half a year as romantic partners, but who’s counting?—it’s that Batman is deeply allergic to concern.

entry.title: weak and powerless (over you)
entry.summary:
Author: byzantinedaydeams

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,773Chapters: 1/16Kudos: 17

Summary: Batman doesn’t trust Superman as far as he can throw him. As it turns out, with a little (a lot) of Kryptonite, that’s not very far. While Batman doesn’t normally compromise his rules, Bruce Wayne deals in gray areas. Compartmentalizing has its perks, and they taste like strawberry lip balm. Although it might seem like their common lifestyles as vigilantes make them a perfect match, as they get to know each other better, they each realize that there is more to the other than meets the eye.(Or: Clark gets a metric fuck-ton of Kryptonite stuck in his body and Bruce decides he’s allowed to break his unwritten “don’t kiss Clark” rule)

entry.title: Undressed Souls
entry.summary:
Author: Selmor_selmor

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,967Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 37

Summary: Clark Kent has spent his life loving Lois Lane with everything he has, but no matter how deep his feelings, it’s never enough. As he struggles to move on from the one person who ever made him feel human, his pain goes unnoticed—except by the quiet, observant eyes of Batman.Batman’s love is silent, subtle, and steadfast, while Superman’s love is bold, loud, and undeniable. Their contrasting ways of loving keep them apart, and Batman is forced to accept the harsh reality: in this universe, their love was never meant to be. Neither Superman’s loud passion nor Batman’s quiet devotion can fill the emptiness left by the one person their hearts ache for.
